text: 22.16: Nam 24.17; Ais 11.1; 11.10; Sek 6.12; Ro 1.3; 2 Pi 1.19; VB 2.28; 5.5Gu Zisas, gu won enser ga sarigim, ana nden han zi. Ana zav nde siosan vhen ki gumgi gu mbigi, ana nde nzuai. Gu nduara mba ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan Devitan nzɨgir shɨgar hɨgi nzɨk ma. Gu mba Mɨn Gorɨr Zav Mbuim Manera Ndai Kama Ŋaara Bakɨme” ma.
